welcome_message_body: Welcome to Montreuil, the charming town known for its picturesque streets, historic architecture, and vibrant arts scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: La Table des Troys
restaurants.description: La Table des Troys is a french restaurant located in Vincennes.

restaurants.name: Léon de Bruxelles
restaurants.description: Léon de Bruxelles is a seafood restaurant located in Rosny-sous-Bois.

restaurants.name: Fulgurances l'Adresse
restaurants.description: Fulgurances l'Adresse is a french restaurant located in Paris.

restaurants.name: Au Petit Panisse
restaurants.description: Au Petit Panisse is a french restaurant located in Paris.

restaurants.name: Bistrot Paul Bert
restaurants.description: Bistrot Paul Bert is a french restaurant located in Paris.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily used by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with a one-hour time limit per session. Premium wifi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly Air France and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals serving various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly serving low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport
